content.rendered:
About Shamrock Roofing and Construction

Thank you for your interest in Shamrock Roofing and Construction, your local residential and commercial roofing contractors. Our services cover everything from roof repair to specialty commercial re-roofs. We are one of the leading roofing companies in our metropolitan areas. Shamrock Roofing has been in business for over 45 years. During that time, we have become experts in dealing with all types of roofing materials and products including composition & asphalt shingles, metal roofs, PVC, built-up roofing systems, TPO, and clay tiles. We have dedicated teams that specialize in flat roof repair who are experts in their field.

Residential roof repair can be very stressful and we understand that you want to be sure you have the best roofing company doing the work. We also know that owning a commercial property is a big responsibility! As your local commercial roofing contractors, we can help bear some of that load with quality roof repair or installation. Shamrock Roofing is licensed, bonded, and insured. Our roofers know how to effectively work with your insurance claim process with little to no hassles. Call one of our offices during regular business hours to schedule a free roof inspection with one of our project managers.

Weâ€™ll walk you through some basic questions to determine your needs and will set up a time to come out and give you a free estimate. Shamrock Roofing is a trusted, experienced and quality roofing company in the residential & commercial roofing contractors construction space. One Call Does It All!
